content:
Your art is your greatest passion, whatever form it takes. Adventuring might help you find inspiration, or simply be a way to survive until you become a world-famous artist.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Dexterity or Charisma, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the Crafting skill and the Art Lore skill. You gain the Specialty Crafting skill feat.

  • @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Specialty Crafting (Alchemy)]{Specialty Crafting (Alchemy)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Specialty Crafting (Artistry)]{Specialty Crafting (Artistry)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Specialty Crafting (Blacksmithing)]{Specialty Crafting (Blacksmithing)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Specialty Crafting (Bookmaking)]{Specialty Crafting (Bookmaking)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Specialty Crafting (Glassmaking)]{Specialty Crafting (Glassmaking)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Specialty Crafting (Leatherworking)]{Specialty Crafting (Leatherworking)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Specialty Crafting (Pottery)]{Specialty Crafting (Pottery)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Specialty Crafting (Shipbuilding)]{Specialty Crafting (Shipbuilding)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Specialty Crafting (Stonemasonry)]{Specialty Crafting (Stonemasonry)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Specialty Crafting (Tailoring)]{Specialty Crafting (Tailoring)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Specialty Crafting (Weaving)]{Specialty Crafting (Weaving)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Specialty Crafting (Woodworking)]{Specialty Crafting (Woodworking)}
name: Artist
